June 18, 2005 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmans-festival-class-a
Contest Music
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK March ('Roll Away Bet' - J. Ord Hume): 1 Bodmin, 96 2 Camborne, 95 3 St. Austell, 94
Best Player: Nick Abbott, trombone, Camborne Town
Best Soprano: Jeremy Squibb, Camborne Best Solo Cornet: Steve Hawkey, Bodmin Best Euphonium: Kimberley Bazeley, St. Dennis Best Solo Horn: Rebecca Adams, St. Austell Best Set of Basses: Camborne
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Claire Parkyn – St. Dennis Youth, Jacob Pritchard – St. Dennis Youth
Deportment (judge Gareth Roberts): 1 Torrington (4th section) 2 Bugle (2nd section)
May 5, 2010, 3:32 p.m. Aug. 7, 2013, 12:49 p.m.
1 Camborne Town Band Frank Renton
2 Bodmin Town Band Kevin MacKenzie
3 St. Austell Town Band David Loukes
